text.paragraph: Maybe you plan to run a marathon, swim, cycle or participate in a competition.  Why not create a sponsorship page with St Mark Universal Copts Care so that you can raise money for our cause through sponsorship from family, friends and colleagues.

With Virgin Money Giving, you can create your own sponsorship page that links directly to us, and deals gift aid directly, allowing you to raise funds easily and efficiently while you focus on your preparations for the event.

You could host a dinner, bake sale, coffee morning, barbecue or a school or community event.  We can help by supplying materials for you to promote the charity, and offer advice for organising your event.
Musical performances and concerts are also a great way to get involved.

Whether you charge set prices, or would like a donation box for the event, these private initiatives are a great way of supporting our work and we are happy to help promote your event on our website and social media.
